text: He amadera palanakarta, ami nijera eka santanake tomara pabitra grhera sannikate casabadahina upatyakaya abada karechi; he amadera palanakarta, yate tara namaya kayema rakhe. Atahpara apani kichu lokera antarake tadera prati akrsta karuna ebam taderake phaladi dbara ruyi dana karuna, sambhabatah tara krtajnata prakasa karabe
